about_the_game:
You awaken on an unknown island, your mind shrouded in fog and no memory of how you arrived. All you know is that the puzzles around you are the only way to uncover the truth and find a way out.

Albatross Program is an immersive puzzle game that guides you through a world of mysterious locations and intriguing challenges. Each solved puzzle reveals fragments of a greater secret, bringing you closer to the heart of the mystery.

Albatross Program is a single-player, first-person experience where every element is designed to respect your curiosity and the value of your time. There are no fillers: every challenge, choice, and discovery adds depth to the experience, introducing new mechanics and ideas. In short, it’s a journey full of surprises and innovation.

An experience that will test your wits and determination, where every step is a discovery, and every solution unveils a new revelation.

name: Albatross program

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 780
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 3060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: You wake up on an unknown island, surrounded by mysterious puzzles. Each solution reveals new secrets, bringing you closer to your escape... or your fate.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support
